participant_1.background:
I like to watch psychological thrillers because they make me think about my own life.
My most valued material possession is my stethoscope
my children are a dissapointment.
I'm sad that my laptop's battery is faulty.
My first purchase was a new teaching outfit to inspire my students to love their bodies as much as I love mine.

participant_2.background:
My favorite websites are the ones that allow me to share my opinions and connect with people who share my interests.
I'm happily married to the love of my life.
i am well built and tall.
i love the chainsmokers.
I met my family through the military.

content.text: I love psychological thrillers, they always leave me thinking.
Me too! I like to watch them and think about how I would have acted in that situation.
I know what you mean. I always wonder what would happen if I was put in that situation.
What is your most valued material possession?
My stethoscope, I use it every day and it's helped me save a lot of lives.
That is a great answer! I wish I had something that important to me.
It was a new teaching outfit. I wanted to inspire my students to love their bodies as much as I love mine.
That is great! I am sure your students loved it.
I hope so, I put a lot of thought into it.
I love the Chainsmokers, they always make me feel good.
Me too! They are one of my favorite bands.
I am glad we have so much in common!
Me too! I think we could be great friends.
